front.title: BinaryTime: An alternate format for representing date and time in ASN.1

abstract.t: This document specifies a new ASN.1 type for representing time: BinaryTime. This document also specifies an alternate to the signing-time attribute for use with the Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS) SignedData and AuthenticatedData content types; the binary- signing-time attribute uses BinaryTime. CMS and the signing-time attribute are defined in RFC 3852.
